mapper.select: select c.course_number, c.course_name, c.course_create_time, c.course_end_time, t.teacher_id as "teacher.teacherId", teacher_name as "teacher.teacherName", teacher_title as "teacher.teacherTitle" from course c, teacher t where t.teacher_id = c.teacher_id and c.course_number = #{courseNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into course(course_number, course_name, course_create_time, teacher_id) value (#{courseNumber}, #{courseName}, now(), #{teacher.teacherId})
